title: Eating Media Lunch
overview: Eating Media Lunch has presenter Jeremy Wells mercilessly mock all manner of mainstream media and "issues of the day" journalism whilst somehow managing to keep a straight face. A highly acclaimed media satire in the vein of the Daily Show, Eating Media Lunch bravely takes alternative views to mainstream media attitudes. As a result the material is invariably very funny and cutting edge. No fish is too big or barrel too small to be skewered by this oft-controversial current events show.
